message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale, valued at $4000000. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to acquire something truly exceptional. As there is a 50% chance of it being worth nothing to me, I'd prefer to see some evidence of the product's quality before committing to such a large purchase. Perhaps you could offer a sample or provide more details about the product?
